itunes:title: #6: 3 Ways to Choose People Who Won't Burn You, Disappoint You, or Hurt You
title: #6: 3 Ways to Choose People Who Won't Burn You, Disappoint You, or Hurt You
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, I give you three ways to ensure you are not choosing people who may end up hurting you down the road. We talk about learning from previous lessons, paying attention to your inner voice, and not being bogged down by guilt!  Take a...
itunes:summary:
In this episode, I give you three ways to ensure you are not choosing people who may end up hurting you down the road. We talk about learning from previous lessons, paying attention to your inner voice, and not being bogged down by guilt! 

Take a listen and share with a friend who needs it! 

 

Take Our Free Masterclass:
How to Fix Your Internal Magnet: The 6 Step Method to Stop Attracting and Obsessing About Unavailable Partners to Get the Love You Deserve
